name: Twist & Pop
description:
Every dot matters when you are saving a cat! An evil professor has sent a helpless kitty to another dimension. Use all your dot-matching skills to help a friendly raccoon save a purr thing!

Make your way through the wonderful map where each and every level is full of surprises. Unique bursting dots will help you on this adventure — activate them to reach maximum effect!

---------------------------

TWIST & POP FEATURES:

• Detonate bombs, throw shurikens, and launch rainbows

• Amazing challenges on every level

• Burst dots chains and get rewards

• Powerful boosters will help you unlock your superskills

• Compete against your friends on Facebook

• Earn special awards from Game Center

---------------------------

LIKE US ON FACEBOOK: https://www.facebook.com/TwistAndPopPuzzleGame

---------------------------

PLEASE NOTE: While Twist & Pop is free to play, some in-game items and functions can be purchased for real money. If you don't want this option enabled, please disable in-app purchases on your device.

---------------------------
